casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE. No. 606A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 20, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of March 2008 by Defendant to By-Pass N.C. Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of March 2008."
